synopsis.text: Aoi's room holds a treasure chest filled with memories, as she and Hinata discover handmade accessories that transport them back to their shared childhood. Meanwhile, Kokona embarks on a nostalgic journey down a familiar path, revisiting places she once explored with her mother. As the seasons change, Hinata stumbles upon a mysterious acorn in Aoi's room, sparking a wave of recollections from a forgotten event in their past. Yama no Susume: Omoide Present intertwines these tales of cherished memories and the creation of new ones, as the girls reflect on their mountaineering adventures and the precious moments spent with loved ones.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
